description: Provides case studies of teeage pregnancies looking at the outcome for each girl when it was discovered that she was pregnant. Considers adoption, abortion, keeping the child, and living with one's family. Highlights the enormous stress of being a teenage mother and points out that girls should fight peer group pressure to have sexual relationships if they do not wish to do so.
